Message.Title: Yahoo chart wrong
Message.Msg: As usual Yahoo! Inc. spreads false information and should be sued out of existence.
probably be dead money for a while. Stock is at it's high end of it valuation range (PE ratio).
thank you for not taking the time to explain what chart your talking about
Wow ! This is an instant classic !! A hall of famer post for sure !

Message.Title: Owned KO for 20 years.
Message.Msg: KO is a stock that you simply hold in your port and never look at. I have it set up in the DRIP program they offer. I can`t begin to tell you through good and bad times how well KO has preformed. This is my second stock split. For those who are new to KO or worried, DON~T BE!! This stock will continue to grow and prosper....

Topic.Title: Can You Really Get Rich Using Stock Trading Techniques?

Message.Msg: Held ko same for over 20 years...retired from coke with 30 years...their was never any stopping their growth...this company continues to evaluate their position world wide and makes the necessary adjustments to move forward... 3 years from now ko will be in the 60's

I can't speak for KO's future but I am also in the same boat. Purchased KO at three times over past 23 years. 1989, 1995, and in 2010. DRIP in between. Stock price in the 2000s languished and the DRIP being in place helped with the lower prices. KO at $60 seems way overpriced. Continue to believe that it is a must for long term dividend players.

Message.Title: Time to jack Coke product prices up 20% again.
Message.Msg: Even with a 50% increase people would buy. Americans are addicted and love to blow money. America already subsidizes the rest of the world's drug research through higher drug prices. Americans will also bail out the European banks. Just charge to those in the US.

Message.Title: Extra Shares Yet?
Message.Msg: Has anybody got their extra shares yet? I received the 2 for 1 but not the additional shares as of yet.

Topic.Title: For All The Dumb Split Answers

Message.Msg: I bought at regular price before the split. Why won't Computershare give me extra share?

Topic.Title: Time to jack Coke product prices up 20% again.

Message.Msg: But will they pay for your psychiatric treatment?
There are no extra shares. It was a 2 for 1 split. That's all. You already have what you were supposed to get.

Topic.Title: For All The Dumb Split Answers

Message.Msg: If you bought during the period of July 25th through August 10th you have to wait until the due bill settlement date.
Oh meh gawd... not more of these stupid questions....
I miss understood I thought it read that we would get an additional share in addition to the 2 for 1. I was thinking what a sweet deal.
